entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Thanks to Kossuth's influence, Malantinians often act on impulse, and are consequently tend to be more chaotic in nature.

entries.name: Size
entries: Malantinian Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Malantinian, and either High or Low Common.

entries.name: Human Adaptability
entries: You have proficiency in one skill of your choice, and gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: Kossuth's Touch
entries: The spirit of Kossuth flows through you, granting you resistance to fire damage.
